revised_title: Obituary of Charles Watkins Merrifield: A Pioneering Mathematician and Naval Architect
tldr: The obituary of Charles Watkins Merrifield highlights his significant contributions to the fields of naval architecture and applied mathematics, as well as his efforts in promoting the development and application of mathematical methods in various branches of mechanics, particularly in hydraulics. Merrifield's work in naval architecture and his dedication to improving mathematical education left a lasting impact on the scientific community.
